extensionDesc.message: For Youtube & YouTube Music, this extension reflects the youtube interface in a canvas (most especifically the video player). Mirror or cast any YouTube video behind it in real time with extensive settings.

extension_err_connection.message: The page lost connection with the extension, please refresh the page or activate the extension.

option_reset.message: Do you want to reset ReflecTube settings to default?

option_resetting.message: Settings have been reset to default

extension_err_menu.message: Can't open menu outside of Youtube

devMessage.message: Thank you so much {user} for using ReflectTube!

loadError.message: An error occurred while loading the Reflectube plugin.

tooltip_ambient_mode.message: Injects the reflection inside the player. Optimized for Shorts/Miniplayer. Replaces default mode.

tooltip_ambient_size.message: Adjust the size of the ambient glow relative to the video.

tooltip_master.message: Enable or disable the extension globally.

tooltip_opacity.message: Adjust the transparency of the reflection.

tooltip_blur.message: Apply a blur effect to the reflection.

tooltip_contrast.message: Adjust the contrast between light and dark areas.

tooltip_sepia.message: Apply a vintage sepia tone filter.

tooltip_audio.message: Enable visual effects that react to audio output.

tooltip_sensitivity.message: Adjust how sensitive the visuals are to audio volume.

tooltip_framerate.message: Set the refresh rate of the reflection (lower ms = smoother).

tooltip_smoothness.message: Adjust the smoothness of the movement interpolation.

tooltip_resolution.message: Set the rendering resolution of the canvas.

tooltip_camerashake.message: Simulate a handheld camera movement effect.

tooltip_cameraintensity.message: Adjust the intensity of the camera shake.

tooltip_legacy.message: Use the old rendering method (may be faster on some devices).

tooltip_pointer.message: Reflection moves in the opposite direction of the mouse.

tooltip_visualizer.message: Show a dynamic color visualizer based on audio frequencies.

tooltip_visualizer_type.message: Choose the visualization style for audio.

tooltip_invert.message: Invert the colors of the reflection.

tooltip_sharpness.message: Enhance edge definition and detail clarity.

tooltip_webgl.message: Enable experimental GPU acceleration for liquid distortion effects.

welcome_profile.message: ['Happy January', 'Happy February', 'Happy March', 'Happy April', 'Happy May', 'Happy June', 'Happy July', 'Happy August', 'Happy September', 'Happy October', 'Happy November', 'Happy December']

rec_vq_enhancer_desc.message: Improve sharpness, lighting, gamma and saturation of any video

rec_ambient_desc.message: Adds ambient lighting effects around the video

tooltip_music_only.message: Only activate effects on music videos. Detects genre automatically.

tooltip_preset.message: Apply a one-click filter preset that configures multiple sliders at once.

tooltip_crop_canvas.message: Automatically detects and removes black bars from the reflection canvas.

tooltip_crop_video.message: Automatically detects and removes black bars from the video player.

native_ambient_mode_disabled.message:
ReflecTube: To prevent this message from appearing again, disable the native Ambient Mode or Cinematic Lighting in the player settings.

The native Ambient Mode of YouTube has been hidden/removed for now to avoid conflicts and the black box in ReflecTube.
